reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My wife is happy with it
reviews.reviewText: The title says it all.Seems like good quality and a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: this is a nice, sturdy mirror. My husband loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elevate ones makeup, and skincare routine
reviews.reviewText: The Schliersee 3X Magnifying Vanity is a must-have for anyone looking to elevate their makeup, skincare or hair trimming routine. The 3X magnification allows for precise application and the high-quality mirror provides crystal clear reflections. The beautiful design and black colored frame adds an elegant touch to any space. The adjustable angles make it easy to use and the sturdy base ensures stability. Overall, I highly recommend the Schliersee 3X Magnifying Vanity for its functionality, durability, and aesthetic appeal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality mirror
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is easy to put together, feels very sturdy and well made, and the dual sides makes doing your makeup a breeze. It's so nice being able to zoom in while I'm perfecting my eyeliner or tweezing my brows. It also looks so sleek and nice on my black vanity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great For The Price
reviews.reviewText: Actually pretty decent for what the cost is.I don't get a ton of use out of it outside of being able to see myself when I comb my hair before work, but my GF loves it and gets a fair bit of use out of it.Overall, it's sturdy and hasn't had any issues. Can recommend it for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great vanity mirror
reviews.reviewText: I love the large size of the mirror. It gives a good reflection on both sides. It's perfect for applying makeup and the magnified side is perfect for seeing pesky, random facial hair. It also looks nice. It's not like ugly plastic mirrors I see for sale sometimes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice mirror. It's heavy enough to be very stable, it has a smooth action but stays at the angle you place it, and the 3x magnification is great for my teen and tween to apply makeup. My old eyes need stronger magnification, but I got this for my daughters and it's perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great size mirror
reviews.reviewText: The mirror is a great size. It has to be put together but it was easy to do. I like the 3x magnification and that no matter what angle you put it at it’s going to stay unlike other mirrors.
